results.title: Lentiform Fork Sign Secondary To Metformin-Induced Encephalopathy.
results.text_hl: We report a case of @DISEASE_Confusion @DISEASE_MESH:D003221 @@@confusion@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Gait_Ataxia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020234 @@@ataxic gait@@@ in a @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ with @DISEASE_Kidney_Failure_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D007676 @@@end stage renal disease@@@ and ongoing @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use.

citations.NLM: Santos MA. Lentiform Fork Sign Secondary To Metformin-Induced Encephalopathy. J Brown Hosp Med. 2025;4(1):38-40. PMID: 40027456

results.title: Pontine and bilateral cerebellar lesion in osmotic demyelination syndrome associated with uncontrolled type II diabetes mellitus: a case report
results.text_hl: On follow-up after 2 months, the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ only had a mild @<m>DISEASE_Gait_Ataxia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020234 @@@gait problem@@@ with no other issues.

citations.NLM: Shrestha S, Kharel S, Gautam S, Poddar E, Adhikari S, Acharya S, Pant SR, Jha A, Ojha R.
